channel.title: Client Connection Troubles
channel.description:
I'm not 100% sure what to do to solve this but;
Basically I'm using a server, and it's a delta source, but for some reason clients with the bluurr file don't connect to it, they just get kicked out instantly. So...
Does anyone have a non-blurr client with SWAT's animations, no cache editing, the GUI added with a couple of features and loads models from the models folder?
I'll rep++ anyone who can give me a good client that actually connects to the server.

item.title: Client Connection Troubles
item.dc:creator: @WaleedScape WaleedScape
item.description:
@WaleedScape wrote:

well, bluurrs only connect to a server with a correct UID.
but, my client has all of SWAT’s tuts, and everything you stated, but here take a look at my topic and have a look at my client!

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars


i have all of SWAT’s tuts done
All models load from models folder
no glitches, bugs.
correct models too
GUI is added also
you cant edit cache, last time i did i fucked it up

Read full topic
